title:
I just had my car inspection done the other day. When I got home I saw that I am still being charged $6.25 for insp. sticker. We do not get those sticker\'s anymore, why are we still being charged for them? The girl at the shop did not know the answer.



Thank\'s

Tim Baker
text:
I suspect the reference to the sticker is actually the inspection
fee.



Here's a related link which might help explain the fee schedule:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7455
